rukus.text: 14|13|ittae bulsinjadeul-eun seonjijadeul-ege malhadeola ulineun neohuileul ittang eseo chubanghalila animyeon uliui jong-gyolo gwiuike halila geulihayeo junimkkeseo geudeul-ege gyesileul naelisyeoss-euni joejieun jadeul-eul myeolmangke halila
14|14|geulihayeo neohuiwa geu ihuui baegseongdeul-eul i ttang-e geojuke halini ineun nae ap-eseo dulyeowohaneun jawa naui beol-eul dulyeowohaneun jaleul wiham ila
14|15|seonjijadeul-i gang-guhani geomanhamyeo baebanhaneun modeun jaga myeolmangke doe eossdeola
14|16|jiog-i geudeul dwie issgo geu an-eseo piga seokk-in golm-eun mul-eul masi nila
14|17|geugeos-eul masidoe geoui samkil sueobs-eumyeo jug-eum-i modeun gos-eseo geue ge dagaodoe ajig jugji anihani geu ap-eneun gotongseuleoun beol ppun-ila

14|18|junim-eul bulsinhaneun jaleul biyu hasa geudeul-i haneun il-eun pogpung-i bu neun nal pogpung-e hwinallineun jaewa gat-a geudeul-i eod-eun geos-eul gamsuhaji mosha ni geugeos-i choehuui banghwang-ila
14|19|hananimkkeseo jinlilo cheonjileul changjohasyeoss-eum-eul neohuineun alji moshaneu nyo geubun-i wonhasil ttae neohuileul jegeo hasigo saelohi changjohasinila

14|21|geudeul moduga mudeom-eulobuteo junim ap-eulo naomae yeon-yaghan jadeul i omanhan jadeul-ege malhagil sillo ulineun neohuileul chujonghaess-euni neohuineun-ulileul hananim-ui beollobuteo jogeum-ilado bohohal su issneunyago muddeola hananim-i ulileul indohaess-eossdeolamyeon ulido neohuileul indohaess-eulila ije-uliga noyeowohageona innaehanda hadeolado byeoldoliga eobs-euni uliegeneun pisincheoga eobsnolago hadeola
